Request.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="UpdateLimitsDataSet" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Protocol" Type="System.String" Value="Remoting"/> <Attribute Name="Label" Type="System.String" Value="UpdateLimits"/> </Attributes> <DataTable Name="AutoPaymentLimitsDataTable"> <Columns> <Column Name="REQUEST_ID" Type="System.String"/> <Column Name="PERSONAL_ACCOUNT_ID" Type="System.Int64"/> <Column Name="LIMIT_VALUE" Type="System.Decimal"/> </Columns> <Rows> <Row REQUEST_ID="reversecut(##org.id##,4)-##GlobalUid##" PERSONAL_ACCOUNT_ID="##PersonalAccount##"/> </Rows> </DataTable> </DataSet>

RollbackRequest.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="UpdateLimitsDataSet" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Protocol" Type="System.String" Value="Remoting"/> <Attribute Name="Label" Type="System.String" Value="UpdateLimits"/> </Attributes> <DataTable Name="AutoPaymentLimitsDataTable"> <Columns> <Column Name="REQUEST_ID" Type="System.String"/> <Column Name="PERSONAL_ACCOUNT_ID" Type="System.Int64"/> <Column Name="LIMIT_VALUE" Type="System.Decimal"/> </Columns> <Rows> <Row REQUEST_ID="reversecut(##org.id##,4)-##GlobalUid##" PERSONAL_ACCOUNT_ID="##PersonalAccount##" LIMIT_VALUE="replacestr('##LIMIT_VALUE##',',','.')"/> </Rows> </DataTable> </DataSet>
